    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030404</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030404</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">¿Dónde clasificamos los líquenes?</string>
            <string language="en">Where shall we classify lichens?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wo sollen wir Flechten einstufen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Où devons-nous classifier des lichens ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Onde devemos nós classificar lichens?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove classificare i licheni?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού θα ταξινομήσουμε τις λειχήνες;</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno debe estudiar qué son los líquenes, dónde viven, cómo se reproducen y en qué reino de seres vivos se podrían clasificar.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must study what lichens are, where they live, how they reproduce and in what kingdom of living beings they could be classified.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Líquenes</string>
            <string language="en">Lichens</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer studieren muß, was 
Flechten sind, wo sie leben, wie sie reproduzieren und in, welchem 
Königreich der lebenden Wesen sie eingestuft werden konnten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit étudier ce que 
sont les lichens, où ils vivent, comment ils se reproduisent et dans 
quel royaume des êtres vivants ils pourraient être classifiés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante deve estudar o que os lichens 
são, onde vivem, como reproduzem e em que reino de seres vivos 
poderiam ser classificados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve studiare che cosa i licheni 
sono, dove vivono, come riproducono ed in che regno degli esseri 
viventi potrebbero essere classificati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να μελετήσει 
ποιες λειχήνες είναι, όπου ζουν, πώς αναπαράγουν και σε ποιο 
βασίλειο των ζωντανών οντων μπόρεσαν να ταξινομηθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flechten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
